text: Yaqoub Tavakoli () was born in 1967 in Amol, Iran and he is a researcher, a historian, a lecturer and expert on political issues. He holds a master's degree in political science and an MA in international relations. He has also leveled four in regional education. Tavakoli has expertise in the fields of mainstreaming history, mainstreaming political, Islamic movements, contemporary history changes, history of Iran-Iraq war and contemporary character recognition. He is a faculty member of the Islamic Maaref University. Some of his executive activities are Editor in chief of Zamaneh magazine, executive management of a group of Islamic Thought and Culture Research, group management of the guidance and preaching of Majlis Research Center and Administration of Martyrs Holy Defense Encyclopedia Project.
